trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta le opzioni che possono essere impostate per un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>viene utilizzato per generare schemi XSD da un tipo o assembly.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>per generare [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] codice da un documento dello schema.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]importazione ed esportazione di schemi, vedere [Schema importazione ed esportazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [l'esportazione di schemi dalle classi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>proprietà viene utilizzata per il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>per includere i tipi che possono essere letti in un oggetto grafico.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]il contratto dati e i tipi noti, vedere [tipi conosciuti di contratto dati](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un surrogato di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"></xref> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: Un'implementazione del <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"> </xref> interfaccia che può essere utilizzato per personalizzare la modalità di esportazione di una rappresentazione dello schema XML per un tipo specifico.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di tipi che possono essere rilevati durante la serializzazione o deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The KnownTypes property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà KnownTypes viene utilizzata il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>per includere i tipi che possono essere letti in un oggetto grafico (impostati utilizzando il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà).</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]il contratto dati e i tipi noti, vedere [tipi conosciuti di contratto dati](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""></xref> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""> </xref> raccolta che contiene i tipi che possono essere rilevati durante la serializzazione o deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresentazioni dello schema XML vengono esportate per tutti i tipi specificati in questa raccolta in base il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>.
